Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1).
formula: a(n) = (1-5*(-1)^n)/2 for n>0. - _Colin Barker_, Jun 09 2015a(n) = a(n-2) for n>2. - _Colin Barker_, Jun 09 2015
